commands.name: guide
commands.description: View a guide on how to use PokéHunt

commands.name: hint
commands.description: Get a hint for the spawned Pokémon name

commands.name: invite
commands.description: View the invite link and support server

commands.name: balance
commands.description: Check the amount of credits you have

commands.name: buy
commands.description: Buy rare candies to level up your Pokémon

commands.name: daily
commands.description: Get a certain amount of credits daily

commands.name: favorite
commands.description: Set or unset your pokemon as favorite

commands.name: gamble
commands.description: Gamble your credits with other Hunters

commands.name: hunt
commands.description: Go hunting & encounter a random pokemon

commands.name: redeem balance
commands.description: Find out how many redeems you have

commands.name: redeem spawn
commands.description: Spawn a Pokémon of your choice for a redeem

commands.name: dex
commands.description: Get information about a specific Pokémon

commands.name: nickname
commands.description: Give a Pokémon a nickname or remove it

commands.name: learn
commands.description: Learn your selected Pokémon a move

commands.name: weak
commands.description: Find out which types are immune, resistant or weak others

commands.name: market search
commands.description: Search for a pokemon on the market!

commands.name: market list
commands.description: Add a pokemon to the market!

commands.name: market end
commands.description: Remove a pokemon from the market!

commands.name: auction search
commands.description: Search for a pokemon on the auction!

commands.name: auction list
commands.description: Add a pokemon to the auction!

commands.name: auction end
commands.description: Remove a pokemon from the auction!

commands.name: pay
commands.description: Pay a user some credits or redeems

commands.name: trade
commands.description: Trade Pokémon and/or credits with another Hunter!
